notes: The LLM reported the contract as safe with 0.95 confidence and provided no findings. However, the contract contains a HIGH severity flash_loan vulnerability in the isGranted function. The vulnerability allows users to bypass the minimum voting power requirement by using flashloans - the function checks token.balanceOf(_who) which includes flashloaned tokens, enabling an attacker to create proposals, vote, and execute all in one transaction before repaying the loan. The LLM completely missed this critical vulnerability.
